item.description:
Zumba Toning and Core

A dynamic calorie-torching dance fitness class that uses red-hot midsection exercises, vertical core movements, along with 1lb. weighted sticks to amp up your every move! You'll dance to the latest and hottest music, and groove to sexy Latin beats like: Salsa, Merengue, Cumbia, Reggaetone, and more...

Open to everyone, no previous dance or Zumba experience necessary.

Walk-ins are Always welcome.

Classes are $12.

cash or check

credit card * slight fee for usage
